titleStmt.title: William D.B. Morrill, Financial Statement of Funds expended for the relief of sick and destitute Kentucky Soldiers, and Soldier's wives
CWG1634

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Military Correspondence, 1863-1867

body.p:
Office of the Military State Agent for Kentucky,
Louisville, Ky,,
August, 31st 1865,
Financial Statement of Funds expended for the relief of Sick and destitute Kentucky Soldiers, and Soldiers wives, in the Month of August, 1865. at this Post, by Col,, W. DeB. Morrill. Agent.

To Cash to widow of John White Voucher. A. 12 50
To Tobacco fo Ky. Men in Prison at Lexington " B. 9 00
To Cash & Postage Stamps, " C. 4 35
To Postage Stamps, " D. 15 00
To Stationery. " E. 22 35
To Desk for Office,, " F. 25 00
To Tobacco. " G. 66 50
To Blackberry Cordial. (for sick in hospital) " H. 18 00
To " Wine " " " " I. 24 00
To Cash for Clothing " K. 4 50
$201 10
Wm. DeB. Morrill,
Col,, and Mil,, Agt,, for Kentucky.

Approved and Auditor will send him check for amt_.
Tho E Bramlette Govr

Office of Military Agent for Kentucky --
Louisivlle. Ky.
August. 31st 1865.
Financial Statement, of Col,, W. DeB. Morrill. for August. 1865.
Recd A G O Ky 7" Sep 1865
